Calculate the energy of a Wake funktion and the profile and saves them in Files.

Parameters:
[in] Stream write the result in this file
[in] K a constant
[in] charge a constant
[in] wake the wake function
[in] Lbunch length of the Wake function
[in] profile the distibution of the Particles
[in] material can be either "Copper" or "Alu"
[in] direction can be either "Transversal" or "Longitudinal"
[in] Mode can be either "AC" or "DC"
[in] radius radius of the tube
